sect1.title: Asking for Help and the FAQ
sect1.para: This book is not officially supported by the BLFS editors/maintainers, thus most issues regarding this book's instructions should be reported to those that wrote the instructions in this book with intent to be used in this book. If the instructions in the book are near carbon copies of those found in the BLFS instructions, it might be better going to the editors and maintainers of that book.

For now if your issue should be reported to us, please refer to
and shoot any of the people listed in the section an email. Make it clear it's a BLFS-Next issue.
